channel.title: Needing help coding. IPBAN needed
channel.description:
hey everyone. I need serious help adding an ipban feature to my server. I have spammers, and I cant ever perm. get rid of them. If you can guide me on adding the feature to my server...that'd be great.
Thanks!
kal.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 28, 2008, 12:30:26 am[/size][hr]Also, I have noticed players have viewed but not responde to my very important question..
If you could, please, RESPOND. Sorry for the double post. Kal.
